name: exegetist
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person who carefully studies and then explains a text, especially a religious text such as one from the Bible: Some of the problems in the sacred texts have been explained by exegetists. He was a scholarly exegetist and wrote commentaries on Christian scriptures. Related word
exegesis
More examplesFewer examplesHer work established her as an eminent exegetist.He was known throughout the Islamic world as a theologian and exegetist.This leading exegetist was among the greatest scholars of the twelfth century.An exegetist is often also a historian. No exegetist of philosophical texts has been so influential.
